meanings.definition: The material used to fill something, especially a cushion or toy.
meanings.sent1: The pillow was soft and fluffy because it was filled with stuffings.
meanings.sent2: I need more stuffings to finish sewing the teddy bear.
meanings.sent3: The overstuffed chair looked like it had too many stuffings and was about to burst!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumble of thoughts, like a bag of mixed stuffings.
meanings.sent5: The box was heavy with the weight of the various stuffings inside.

meanings.definition: A mixture of ingredients used to fill a food item, such as a turkey or sandwich.
meanings.sent1: The Thanksgiving turkey was delicious with flavorful stuffings inside.
meanings.sent2: I prefer my sandwich with extra stuffings for more taste.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally dropped all the stuffings on the floor, creating a mess!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out of her like a pot overflowing with joyous stuffings.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked bread mixed with the savory stuffings filled the kitchen.
